snippet.title: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade Edition - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Dawn of the Monsters Arcade Edition DLC & Character Pack is on its way, coming soon to all major platforms!!

 DLC pack includes:
- New Character Meteor Temujin
- Arcade Mode
- 50 new skins

Free Update:
- New Story+
- New Game+, NG++, NG+++
- Trials
- Japanese Voiceovers

Dawn of the Monsters Website: http://www.13amgames.com/dotm

==========
 Game Info
==========
Game: Dawn of the Monsters
Developer: 13AM Games
Publisher: Wayforward
Platform: PC, PS4/5, XBO/SX, NS, Stadia
Release Date: March 2022
Genre: Beat Em Up
Format: Belt Scroller
Players: 2

============
 Where to Buy
============
Steam: https://bit.ly/DOTM_Steam
Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/DOTM_SwitchNA
Playstation 4/5: https://bit.ly/DOTM_PS4PS5NA
Xbox One/Series X: https://bit.ly/DOTM_Xbox
